name: Art Club
description: A club for students interested in exploring their creativity through various art forms.

name: Science Club
description: A club dedicated to students who love science and want to engage in experiments and projects.

name: Drama Club
description: A club for aspiring actors and actresses to practice and perform plays and skits.

name: Music Club
description: A club for students who enjoy playing instruments, singing, and creating music together.

name: Debate Club
description: A club that helps students develop their public speaking and argumentation skills through debates.

name: Coding Club
description: A club for students interested in programming and technology, where they can learn and collaborate on projects.
